name: Vanilla & Passion Fruit Meringues
recipeIngredient: 4 tbsp passion fruit seeds (approx 2 medium fruits)
recipeInstructions: 1. Preheat the oven to Gas mark 1/4 (90C).
2. Split the vanilla pod lengthwise and scrape out the seeds. Set the seeds aside.
3. Follow the preparation for classic meringues.
